summary:

Date: Jan 06, 2025 Source: News24

Anticipation for the iPhone SE 4 has surged, but new reports suggest it may come with a higher price tag than expected.

  • The iPhone SE 4 is rumored to debut at around KRW 8,00,000 (~INR 46,000 or $500), marking a price increase from the SE 3.
  • Expected design improvements include a 6.1-inch OLED display, potentially inspired by the iPhone 14, featuring Face ID.
  • Equipped with Apple’s new A18 chip and up to 8GB of RAM for enhanced performance.
  • Will include Apple’s first in-house 5G modem, marking a technological shift for the company.
  • Questions remain about whether the price will stay under INR 50,000, which would make it highly competitive in the Indian market.

Publication Date: January 5, 2025

Source: Business Wire

Belkin has introduced new products at CES Unveiled Las Vegas, highlighting its commitment to quality and sustainability by utilizing up to 90% recycled materials in their new lineup.

  • Belkin has transitioned over 359 products to use 72-75% post-consumer recycled materials.
  • New accessories will feature 85-90% post-consumer recycled materials starting in Q2 2025.
  • Highlighted products include the BoostCharge Pro Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad and BoostCharge Power Bank.
  • Belkin aims for 100% carbon neutrality in operations by 2025 and across its business by 2030.
“This initiative is estimated to reduce CO2-eq emissions for these product materials by up to 84.8%.”

The launch at CES 2025 demonstrates Belkin's innovative approach to sustainable technology.

title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R launching tomorrow: What to expect? - India Today
summary:
OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R launching tomorrow: What to expect?

Published On: Jan 6, 2025   |   Source: Aman Rashid

OnePlus is all set to launch its highly awaited OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R on January 7. With only a day left before the big event, the company has revealed a few details about the features and upgrades these new devices will bring.

  • The OnePlus 13 is expected to cost under Rs 70,000 for its base variant.
  • The OnePlus 13R is likely to launch at under Rs 50,000.
  • Both models will have flat sides with a clean and minimalistic design.
  • Both devices will feature a 6,000mAh battery with fast charging support.
  • The OnePlus 13 will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, while the 13R will have the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset.
  • Camera specs include advanced lenses and sensors, with the 13R marking the first R-series device to include a telephoto lens.
“The OnePlus 13 is expected to receive 4 years of Android updates and 5 years of security patches, while the OnePlus 13R may get 3 years of Android updates and 4 years of security patches.”

This launch marks significant advancements for OnePlus, with better design, performance, and features catering to different segments of the market.

title: Redmi 14C 5G to launch in India today: Specs, price, and how to watch the event - The Financial Express
summary:
Xiaomi Launches Redmi 14C 5G in India Today

Date: January 6, 2025
Source: Financial Express

Introduction

Xiaomi is set to launch the Redmi 14C 5G in India today, marking the first major smartphone release of 2025 and aiming to provide affordable 5G connectivity.

Key Points

  • The launch event will be streamed live at 12 noon on Xiaomi India's official YouTube channel.
  • Redmi 14C 5G features a 6.88-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate and is powered by the Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor.
  • It includes a 50-megapixel primary camera and supports 5G dual SIM.
  • The expected price is under Rs 15,000, continuing Xiaomi's commitment to budget-friendly devices.
  • Xiaomi has additional launches planned this month, including the Xiaomi Pad 7 on January 10.

Notable Quotes or Statistics

"Xiaomi aims to keep providing budget-friendly 5G smartphones, following the success of the Redmi 13C 5G at Rs 10,999."

Conclusion

The Redmi 14C 5G's launch is significant for budget-conscious consumers looking for affordable 5G options in India, setting the tone for an active month for Xiaomi.

summary:

Samsung has officially announced that its rolling robot, Ballie, equipped with a projector, will be shipped in 2025. The robot can stream information and content and interact with smart home devices using voice commands.

  • The robot can project content onto surfaces and has built-in speakers.

  • During demonstrations, it provided information about Las Vegas attractions and performed tasks like projecting the Uncharted movie.
  • Samsung faces competition from other companies like Amazon and LG in the home robot market.

title: Halliday promises its smart wayfarers have a ‘proactive’ AI assistant inside - Engadget
summary:
Halliday Unveils Smart Glasses with Proactive AI Assistant at CES 2025

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Engadget

Halliday has introduced a new pair of smart glasses at CES 2025 that promise a range of advanced features, including a proactive AI assistant that anticipates user needs.

  • The smart glasses feature a waveguide display that projects a 3.5-inch screen viewable in daylight.
  • They weigh only 35 grams and offer eight hours of battery life.
  • The AI assistant listens to conversations, analyzes them, and can summarize meetings.
  • Users interact through touch-sensitive sides and a bundled trackpad ring.
  • Additional functions include translation of 40 languages, real-time directions, and music playback.
  • Pre-orders will begin at the end of CES, with shipping starting before March 2025, priced between $399 and $499.
“It can also translate 40 different languages, offer real-time directions and play music with the accompanying on-screen lyrics.”

While Halliday presents these features as groundbreaking, the true performance of the glasses in everyday use remains to be seen.
newTitle: Halliday Unveils Smart Glasses with Proactive AI Assistant at CES 2025

Halliday has introduced smart glasses that project images directly onto the user's eye without the need for traditional lenses. This pioneering technology was unveiled at CES 2025, showcasing a blend of fashion and advanced functionality.

  • Available in stylish designs, the glasses are compatible with prescription lenses.
  • The technology offers superior display quality even under bright sunlight, addressing issues faced by traditional smart glasses.
  • Equipped with proactive AI assistance, the glasses can anticipate user needs and provide contextual support.
  • Pricing is set between $399 and $499, with availability after CES and shipping expected by Q1 2025.
“Halliday combines vintage charm and retro elegance with innovation, offering users an invisible superpower to navigate life’s challenges with confidence and style.”

The OnePlus 13 is set to be unveiled globally, promising robust IP68/69 protection against dust and water. This news highlights the enhanced durability expected from this model, catering to outdoor enthusiasts and professionals alike.

  • Global variants of the OnePlus 13 will have dual IP68/IP69 ratings.

  • Rear camera includes three 50MP sensors; front camera features 32MP.

title: SBI's move to up collateral-free study loans could push other lenders | Mint - Mint
summary:
SBI's Move to Offer Collateral-Free Study Loans Could Influence Other Lenders

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Mint

India's largest lender State Bank of India (SBI) has begun offering collateral-free study loans of up to ₹50 lakh for students heading out to top foreign universities, potentially compelling other lenders to adjust their offerings.

  • SBI has introduced collateral-free study loans up to ₹50 lakh.
  • The new loan limit targets students enrolling in prestigious universities like MIT, Oxford, and Harvard.
  • Industry experts suggest this could lead other lenders to enhance their loan offerings.
  • The cap was supposedly raised in late 2022, though SBI has not officially confirmed this change.
“The move may prompt more lenders to raise loan caps to attract students headed abroad,” said industry experts.

This initiative by SBI signifies a noteworthy shift in the educational loan landscape, which could lead to increased competition among lenders aiming to attract students seeking higher education abroad.
newTitle: SBI's Move to Offer Collateral-Free Study Loans Could Influence Other Lenders

title: Weekly deals: a look at renewed iPhone 16, 15, 14 and 13-series models - GSMArena.com
How to remove collections from Credit Report? - Techstory
summary:
How to Remove Collections from Your Credit Report

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Worried about Collections on your Credit Report? This guide discusses methods to remove collections from credit reports and the importance of doing so.

  • The possibility of removing collections depends on several factors, including the age of the collection.
  • Collections can be removed after seven years, but earlier removal is possible through negotiation.
  • Options for removal include sending a dispute to credit bureaus like Experian, TransUnion, and Equifax.
  • A pay-for-delete agreement is another option, where payment may incentivize the agency to remove the collection.
  • Directly requesting deletion from the collection agency can also be effective if the reasons are genuine.
"If you fail to get these collections removed from your credit report, your credit score will be affected, reducing your chances of obtaining a loan in the future."

It's crucial to pursue these methods to maintain a healthy credit score.
newTitle: How to Remove Collections from Your Credit Report
